content.rendered:
What are the career readiness outcomes and metrics that matter? Why is it important for institutions to integrate career services into the student experience?

Handshake’s latest report, Outcomes and Metrics that Matter, authored by Christine Cruzvergara from Handshake and Andy Chan from Wake Forest University, outlines a common set of metrics that institutions should measure to define success.

Watch this panel webinar with Christine Cruzvergara, Andy Chan, and Lynn Pasquerella, President of the Association of American Colleges & Universities, as they discuss the imperative to embed career services in the institution.

View all career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Christine Cruzvergara, Andy Chan, and Lynn Pasquerella discuss the imperative to embed career services in the institution.
